description: The SERVICE_BENEFITS table contains service-level benefit information about the coverages for the encounter or estimate to which this benefit record is attached.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the benefit record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CVG_FOR_SVC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: This related group contains benefit information specific to a coverage and service type.

columns.name: CVG_SVC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The service type for which the listed insurance benefits apply.

columns.name: CVG_SVC_TYPE_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: EVALUATION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current evaluated status of the coverage benefits for this service type (coverage, not covered, in progress, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The copay for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Deductible for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_MET_AMT
columns.description: The amount of the deductible for this coverage and service type that has already been paid.

columns.name: COINS_PERCENT
columns.description: The coinsurance percentage for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: COINS_AMOUNT
columns.description: The coinsurance amount for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: OUT_OF_POCKET_MAX
columns.description: The maximum out-of-pocket payment for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: OUT_OF_PCKT_REMAIN
columns.description: The remaining out-of-pocket payment for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN
columns.description:
Has the out-of-pocket cost been met for this coverage and service type?


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OOP_INCL_DEDUCT_YN
columns.description:
Does the out-of-pocket payment include the deductible cost?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: Track covered days -- this is normally used for Medicare.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The non-covered days  - this is normally used for Medicare

columns.name: COINS_DAYS
columns.description: Track the coinsurance days -- this is normally used for Medicare

columns.name: LTR_DAYS
columns.description: Track the lifetime reserve days -- this is usually used for Medicare.

columns.name: ANNUAL_BEN_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The maximum annual benefits for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: ANNUAL_BEN_REMAIN
columns.description: The annual benefits remaining for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: LIFETIME_BEN_MAX
columns.description: The maximum lifetime benefits for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: LIFETIME_BEN_REMAIN
columns.description: The lifetime benefits remaining for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_AMT
columns.description: The spend down amount for this coverage and service type during the defined interval.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_REMAIN
columns.description: The spend down amount remaining for this coverage and service type during the specified interval.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_INTRVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The interval at which the spend down amount will reset.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


One Week


One Month


Three Months


Six Months


One Year

columns.name: PREEXISTING_COND_YN
columns.description:
Do any pre-existing conditions apply for this coverage and service type?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: PREEXIST_COND_DESC
columns.description: The description of any pre-existing conditions that apply for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: IN_NETWORK_YN
columns.description:
Is in-network care required for this coverage and service type?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: PREFERRED_NETWORK
columns.description: The preferred network, if any, for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: TRACKING_CODE
columns.description: The tracking code for payor communication about this coverage and service type.

columns.name: DEDUCT_REMAIN_AMT
columns.description: The amount of the deductible for this coverage and service type that has yet to be paid.

columns.name: DAILY_COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount that is multiplied by the length of stay to calculate the total inpatient copay for this coverage and service type. This is different from the visit copay amount.

columns.name: MAX_DAILY_COPAY
columns.description: The maximum total amount the patient may be charged in daily copays for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: FAMILY_TIER_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Family tier for this line's coverage and service type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Individual


Family

columns.name: MAX_VISITS
columns.description: The maximum number of visits for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: REMAINING_VISITS
columns.description: The remaining number of visits for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: NET_LVL_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Network level of this line's coverage and service type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In


Out


Out of Area


N/A

columns.name: NON_COVERED_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Notes when a service is not covered by the payor for this encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This is the payor for these service-level benefits. This item is used when recording benefits before a coverage record has been created, such as for estimates for prospective patients.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: SVC_ANNUAL_BEN_USED_AMT
columns.description: The amount that has already been used for this coverage and service type for a given year.

columns.name: RTE_COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the last copay value filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the last deductible amount filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_MET
columns.description: Stores the last deductible met amount filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_REMAIN
columns.description: Stores the last deductible remaining amount filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_COINS_PERCENT
columns.description: Stores the last coinsurance percent filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_OOP_MAX
columns.description: Stores the last OOP max amount filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: RTE_OOP_REMAIN
columns.description: Stores the last OOP remaining amount filed by RTE at the service level

columns.name: PAYER_BEN_CAT
columns.description: The benefit category identifier used by the payer. It will only be set for reference benefit records.

columns.name: VISIT_BEN_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The maximum visit benefits for this coverage and service type.

columns.name: VISIT_OUT_OF_POCKET_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The maximum visit out-of-pocket payment for this coverage and service type.
